Question: NETGEAR CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
NETGEAR

Orbi 860 Series Mesh System

- WiFi 6 system with high-performance antenna design
- 10 Gig internet port
- Blazing fast speed

Orbi 960 Series Quad-band Router

- Part of the award-winning Orbi 960 Series Quad-band WiFi 6E Mesh System
- Fastest, most advanced WiFi 6 system
- Standalone star with blazing fast speed

WAX630E Tri-band WiFi 6E Access Point

- From the Pro WiFi line of SMB access points
- Fast throughput and low latency
- Industry’s most powerful access point with central cloud management
Summary_cn:
NETGEAR

奥比860系列Mesh系统

- WiFi 6系统具有高性能天线设计
- 10Gig互联网端口
- 极速连接速度

奥比960系列四频段路由器

- 赢得奖项的奥比960系列四频段WiFi 6E Mesh系统的一部分
- 最快、最先进的WiFi 6系统
- 单独斩获极速连接速度的明星产品

WAX630E三频段WiFi 6E接入点

- 来自SMB接入点的Pro WiFi产品线
- 高吞吐量和低延迟
- 行业中最强大的接入点，具备集中云管理的能力
